description: Show him some love by showering him with some coffee.
teaser: Show him some love by showering him with some coffee.
title: Are you Kai Ryssdal's biggest fan?
contentencoded:
This final note today, which is a little bit marketing and a little bit genius. And frankly, a little bit godsent.

Twitter and Starbucks launched a new partnership on Monday. It's called -- we kid you not -- @tweetacoffee.

A $5 digital gift to the recipient of your choice. You sync up your Starbucks account and your Twitter account, use the handle @tweetacoffee and the desired recipient. And you're basically there.

And remember all you fans out there. You can tweet Kai at @kairyss -- wait, never mind.

That wouldn't be cool.
